mapper.insert: insert into STORE_REPORT (SREP_NO, CUS_NO, STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, SREP_TITLE, SREP_FILE, SREP_CONTENT, SREP_DATE, SREP_PROCESS) values(concat("SR", IFNULL((select MAX(cast(replace(REV_NO, "SR", "") AS unsigned))+1 FROM STORE_REPORT A), 1)), #{cus_no}, #{store_no}, #{store_name}, #{srep_subject}, #{srep_file}, #{srep_content}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), '0');
